DOC.brief_summary: This study compare PF-00299804 give orally continuous schedule approve drug , erlotinib , patient whose non-small cell lung cancer progress chemotherapy ; patient randomize receive one drug , follow efficacy tolerance .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Trial Of PF-00299804 Taken Orally Versus Erlotinib Taken Orally For Treatment Of Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer That Has Progressed After One Or Two Prior Chemotherapy Regimen
DOC.criteria: advanced measurable NonSmall Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) ; progress 12 prior chemotherapy ; Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) 02 ; tissue available future KRAS/ EGFR test prior Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor ( EGFR ) target therapy ; active untreated Central Nervous System ( CNS ) metastases ;
